@graph.name: Spicy Baked Cauliflower Bites with Celery Ranch. Vegan Recipe - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: These Spicy Baked Cauliflower Bites are easy & spicy. Hot sauce+ black pepper+cayenne, all the heat u need for gameday. Serve with a celery ranch sauce. vegan soy-free

itemListElement.name: Spicy Baked Cauliflower Bites with Celery Ranch. Vegan Recipe

@graph.name: Spicy Baked Cauliflower Bites with Celery Ranch
@graph.description: These Spicy Baked Cauliflower Bites are easy, crusted with breadcrumbs, spicy sauce and addictive. Serve with celery ranch sauce below or other vegan ranch. vegan soy-free.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 to 1 tsp cayenne/ red chili powder
1/2 cup coconut milk (canned, preferably full fat)
2 tbsp flour or 1 Tbsp arrowroot starch
a very generous dash of black pepper
1/2 tsp garlic powder  (or 2 roasted garlic cloves)
1 to 2 tsp ranch seasoning (Or use equal amounts of dried parsley, dill, thyme, garlic powder and onion powder.)
1/2 to 1 tsp celery seeds ((omit to make plain ranch, add some fresh dill for plain ranch))

itemListElement.text: In a bowl, mix everything except cauliflower for the batter. if the batter is too thin, add more flour or starch.
itemListElement.name: In a bowl, mix everything except cauliflower for the batter. if the batter is too thin, add more flour or starch.

itemListElement.text: In another shallow bowl, mix everything under breadcrumb coating.
itemListElement.name: In another shallow bowl, mix everything under breadcrumb coating.

itemListElement.text: Dip cauliflower in the batter, then coat in breadcrumbs and place on parchment lined sheet.(use gloves or a fork. the batter is spicy)
itemListElement.name: Dip cauliflower in the batter, then coat in breadcrumbs and place on parchment lined sheet.(use gloves or a fork. the batter is spicy)

itemListElement.text: Drizzle any remaining batter on the cauliflower. Spray oil.
itemListElement.name: Drizzle any remaining batter on the cauliflower. Spray oil.

itemListElement.text: Bake at pre-heated 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 25 minutes or until a toothpick goes through the cauliflower easily. Serve warm with dip.
itemListElement.name: Bake at pre-heated 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 25 minutes or until a toothpick goes through the cauliflower easily. Serve warm with dip.

itemListElement.text: Blend everything except celery seeds. Taste and adjust salt and flavor. Add celery seeds and blend for a few seconds. Chill and serve.
itemListElement.name: Blend everything except celery seeds. Taste and adjust salt and flavor. Add celery seeds and blend for a few seconds. Chill and serve.
